attributes.comment:
The American Network of Oral Health Coalitions (ANOHC) represents dozens of state level oral health advocates working to improve the oral health of our nation. Our leadership commends CMS for the development of this directory. ANOHC is specifically interested in addressing the inclusion of dental providers in this resource.

1. Dental providers should be included as a vital member of the health care team, particularly because dental access can be harder to work through than physical health providers.
2. CMS should work with EHR or EDR software companies to include live link directory access in these systems, especially considering most emergency dental visits either refer patients back to their PCP or include a blanket statement to follow up with a dentist. An actual referral would be a more effective intervention to ensure appropriate continuity of care.
3. Individual providers are important, but the designation of entire facilities such as FQHCs and RHCs should be identified and included.
